update(ArrayList<BasicEnemy>) - Method in class gameMembers.Player
This method handles the collisions and damage from the player and enemies.
It takes in a list of enemies from the room and decides whether or not the character should accept any damage from them.

updateLoc() - Method in class gameMembers.Bullet
updateLoc
This method updates the location of the bullet based on its velocity.
updateLoc() - Method in class gameMembers.Player
This method updates the location of the character based on what keys are pressed.
It handles diagonal movement as an x and y movement, both of which are roughly the normal velocity divided by the square root of two, per the pythagorean theorem.
